name: Rebecca Altman
text: After a long day swimming we just wanted a quick dinner. It was 8pm. I went in and ordered 2 cheese, 2 pepperoni and cheese bread. I had to wait 30 minutes. I asked how long for just the pizzas.... Same time. There were no pizzas available. ‚Ä¶More

name: William Ryan
text: I think their pizzas are far and above the best out there. The service at this store is always exceptional. Can't go wrong.

name: Elizabeth Shultz
text: Hot fast and only waited about 7 minutes while it cooked. card machine was down, thank goodness we had cash

name: Christian Gruber
text: Unfortunately this is closed down, it was a great source for cheap pizza.

name: am hohn
text: Carried out 6 Hot 'n Ready pizzas for a school event. Order was ready on time and handled smoothly. Good pizza for the price.

name: Chris Edwards
text: This is the best one in the area.  The customer service is amazing and it's cheaper than that grease trap we call Pizza Hut.  Not only that, but the pizza itself is really good too.

name: Jimmy Karl
text: I've given this place Several chances. 1 out of 10 you will get a hot pizza. Cold and old pizza they give you.  They open the box half way and so fast that you don't get a chance to see it. The pizza is great when it's hot but cold it is Disgusting

name: Michael Roth
text: Cheap and quick (appears to be closed now)

name: Jim Cummins
text: I really like this place I just wish they could make up with Corp. And start paying their franchises fees so they can stay open. Call first to see if there open be for you go it will save you from being mad.

name: Unknown ?
text: I gave it a four because the staff which where mostly young teens were working very hard to accommodate the rush of pizza lovers. However, the quality of pizza is ok at best.

name: Brandi Berry
text: Always an easy stop, pizza is always ready and of course the price is reasonable

name: Scott O
text: Refused to honor their free lunch to veteran's.  I showed both managers there a pic of me receiving an award from a 1 star general and had my duty cap with rank along with me.

name: Warren Moore
text: Great staff and customer service, always fast and fresh!

name: Lisa Wells
text: I ordered 2 pizzas (just cheese and pepperoni) and waited for about 15 minutes. As I continued to wait, about 4 or 5 other people walked to the register and walked away with both pepperoni and cheese pizzas. At this time, I asked the man at ‚Ä¶More

name: Josh Meigs
text: Dropped my pizza on the way out and was given a free pizza in its place. Great customer service. Earned my business for years to come

name: Kyle Bodenstab
text: Hot n Ready should be changed to Not Ready

name: jason sheriff
text: Used to be good but horrible experiences over past few months. Hot and Ready certainly doesn't apply at this location and calling ahead will not produce an on time pizza either.

name: Mike Fisher
text: Disappointed.  I called in and ordered a fresh pizza and crazy bread. What I got was the farthest thing from it. Apparently if you want fresh made things you have to go in and wait there. Lost my business.

name: Misha Dainiak
text: Always tasty. Had a 10 minute wait for a specialty pizza, but only because the guy 2 people ahead of me bought all 4 of the ones they had.

name: Kelli Matz
text: Worth th 15 minute wait. Good service.

name: Justin Klimek
text: I live their hot n ready pizza here. They always seem to have one when I get there,and they have a good deal with crazy bread and a 2 liter as well.

name: Robert Svec
text: Always great pizza and fast service.

name: Hayes4Days
text: Food is ok it better than what people expect for a $5 pizza

name: linda chrisman
text: I will never eat one of there pizzas again. They advertise the most meat and cheese. Thats bs. Never again.

name: JDCBOSS
text: Spent 30 min here waiting on 2 three meat pizzas and a combo box and the three meat pizzas have spent 15 min on the shelf while im waiting on the combo box and someone else ordered a combo box and got theres in about 3 min and ive spent 15 ‚Ä¶More

name: Dr. Weston Zenner, D.C.
text: Great price for a cheese pizza.

name: Jake McConnell
text: Not bad for cheap pizza.

name: Marty A
text: In general, Little Caesers isn't bad, but pizza from this particular store can be hit & miss. It all depends on who is working on the day you go in. There is no consistency when it comes to quality. It's either really good or really bad. ‚Ä¶More

name: Batchelor Family
text: I've been disappointed by the crazy bread here a few times though, but all in all it's a pretty good value for the small amount you pay for it.

name: Cable Plus
text: Love the pizza here always friendly

text: I had to wait for 20 minutes for a pizza that was supposed to be hot n ready and then wait an additional 10 minutes because they forgot to put it in. Never going back.
